name: Labor Productivity - The Conference Board Total Economy Database (2016)
title: Labor Productivity - The Conference Board Total Economy Database (2016)
description: Shown is the data series "LP-Hour EKS" from the original source. As the alternative series "LP-Hour GK" this series is series is expressed in PPP adjusted currency. The PPP adjustment is based on the 2011 PPPs and updated to 2015 prices.
